Posts.Content: Hi Allison and Diane. My name is Chantal and I work with the CCTFA Foundation. We're the folks who publish the Lives Affected by Cancer magazine. We also offer the Look Good Feel Better program and the facingcancer.ca online community. Allison, if you haven't already found a copy of the magazine, we would be happy to send one to you. You can request a copy at Please specify that you are looking for the 2011 issue as our 2012 issue will be out in just a few weeks! Thanks! Chantal
Posts.Title: Dance therapy?
